response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its unique features and benefits, we propose a price of $750,000 for this product. We understand that this is a significant investment, but we are confident that the product's quality and potential returns will justify the cost. We look forward to discussing the details with you and exploring how this product can contribute to your needs and goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 750000}
